message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money with a 3:1 ratio in my favor.
My turn! I'll give you a 60-40 split. It's a fair start.
Considering the decrease in value due to inflation, I adjust my offer to a 55-45 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money.
